Contents of text block. Supports markdow: I am a quantiative invasion entomologist specializing in biostatistics/data science, invasion biology, and teaching.  I am seeking to leverage my experience managing complex ecological projects, analyzing data, and communicating results to a wide variety of collaborators to find a role as a data scientist.
Both learning and teaching are life-long skills that can be employed in any position. I look forward to learning from and teaching others throughout my career.

These are a selection of first-authored publications. For a complete list of publications, presentations, and posters please visit my full CV at my [website.](https://wittja01.github.io/website/cv/cv.pdf)
